title: riot plrase do nerf to the zed
body: so they baned moster ji in my renked game, so i go to pick the luks because i am very skill with luks but i is against zed. i try to killer him level 1 mele but he use his op 9999999999999999  damage sord to killer me first. i then come back to mid line but he killer me again when i try to killer him more. so i tty killer him 15 minute but he 20/0 from being op and batang i instant died. i say to all that zed is 9999 dmg all time but he say i brons nob. im not brons nob as brons myy team just is worse mens then enemy mens. so i tell him to get caner but i got baned again. riot nerf this.

K

makes more sense than most of my ranked game chats.
Quality Thread...doubt Riot can still refuse to nerf Zed after reading this.
If you noticed Fizz is near Zed as well. Sorry I haven't played this game in 5 months so I wouldn't know whether Fizz got nerfed or not.

If you notice though, Fizz has the second lowest average CS out of the assassins. Leblanc is also on the lower end in that regard. Zed is the only one that is on the extreme high end of both farming and assassination safety. Having both makes him a really safe, reliable, low risk assassin, which is a pretty frustrating situation to play against... I agree that Fizz is pretty strong as well, but at least he can be zoned from farming early on which gives him some risk to compensate for his high reward assassinations.
_This_ is terrible. Get my upvote for discovering such injustice. {{champion:238}} {{item:2009}}

> [{quoted}](name=Hemulen Magi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gxguqa3k,comment-id=001b,timestamp=2016-01-03T22:32:00.319+0000)
>
> I get that you are being sarcastic, but the real Zed complaints aren't all unjustified. 
> 
> The "just don't feed him" argument doesn't work when you are talking about a champion that is statistically in the top 5 for average kills per game. Zed also has the highest average gold income of all assassins due to his easy farming. Preventing him from getting fed enough to scale up with items is a lot harder than pretty much any other champion in the game.
> 
> Whenever play rate increases, win rate will typically decrease due to inexperienced players playing the champion. Zed has both a top tier win rate and popularity. Zed has an easy skill floor (48% winrate for brand new players) and a very high skill cap (57% winrate at 125+ games played); other champions (Shen as an example) are often nerfed for having similar winrates for highly experienced (125+ games) players.
> 
> Zed just has too many strengths. Below are some rankings comparing him to the other primary assassins competing for the mid lane role.  Zed is in the top 3 for 8/9 statistics, especially important being skill cap, assassination safety, gold earned, popularity, and damage dealt. Honestly, Zed should either give up some of his easy farming or some of his assassination safety, because outperforming most other assassins in both makes him far too reliable.
>
